Title: Nigeria’s Federal Colleges of Education to offer bachelor’s degrees
Summary: Federal Government of Nigeria announced on May 2, 2025, the implementation of the Dual Mandate Policy for Federal Colleges of Education (FCOEs) It follows the enactment of the Federal colleges of Education Act, 2023 . Signed into law by President Bola Oladeja, the Federal Government announced the new policy .

Title: Herdsman jailed 10 years for destroying N50m farm crops
Summary: A Magistrate Court sitting in Akure, Ondo State capital, has sentenced a herdsman to ten years’ imprisonment for destroying farm crops worth N50 million . The herder, Dan-Bello, was also accused of violating the state’s anti-open grazing law .

Title: OAUTHC under fire for charging students placement fees
Summary: Obafemi Awolowo University Teaching Hospitals Complex (OAUTHC) has come under fire for charging students placement fees . Multiple sources said that students applying for placements apply for industrial training placements .

Title: Late Ubah’s political family denies rift, affirms loyalty to APC
Summary: Members of Senator Ifeanyi Ubah’s political family in Anambra State have denied any rift in their fold . They said the late senator's commitment to the All Progressives Congress (APC) and support for President Bola Tinubu remain inviolable .

Title: Cholera: NCDC reports 1,307 cases, 34 deaths across 30 states
Summary: As the country approaches the peak of the rainy season, the Nigeria Centre for Disease Control and Prevention (NCDC) urges Nigerians to avoid open defecation, indiscriminate refuse dumping, ensure proper disposal of waste, and frequent clearing of sewage . NCDC reports 1,307 cases, 34 deaths across 30 states .

Summary: Pep Guardiola says he will take a break from football when he leaves Manchester City . Guardiola does not know if he will retire from the game .

Title: Group carpets Okpebholo over demolition of NBM secretariat in Benin

Title: EPL: Arteta congratulates Liverpool, says Arsenal’s title miss hurts
Summary: Arsenal coach, Mikel Arteta has congratulated Liverpool for winning the 2024/2025 premier league season . Liverpool’s thumping 5-1 win at home to Tottenham on Sunday put them out of reach of nearest challengers Arsenal with four games to go . Arsenal have not won the Premier League since 2004, under Arsene Wenger .

Title: Military arrests two security agents, others helping terrorists in North-East
Summary: The Defence Headquarters has confirmed the arrest of four collaborators aiding terrorist operations in the North-East . The Director, Defence Media Operations, Major General Markus Kangye, made the disclosure in a statement on Friday . He expressed concern over the betrayal and warned commanders to sensitise their personnel against acts that could sabotage ongoing military efforts .
